ProjectTitle: Functional dissection of RNA modifiers in immune cells using CROPseq

2. Data: Please also describe your samples (physical data) here. 
4. Documentation/ Metadata: you can add here how you will document your data for your own reuse, are you using protocols, (e)notebooks? The repositories that you mention for data sharing will also ask to add metadata, FlowRepository uses MIFlowCyt and GEO MINSEQE (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/info/MIAME.html) for example 
6. Please note that although FWO requests 5 years of preservation, the KU Leuven RDM policy expects 10 years of data preservation (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy)
